testsuite.name: com.xyldrun.presentation.viewmodel.MovieListViewModelTest

testcase.name: loadMovies shows cached data when network is unavailable
loadMovies with forceRefresh resets state and loads fresh data
network state changes trigger refresh when in error state
loadMovies handles errors during load more
refresh method forces refresh of data
initial state is Loading and triggers initial load
loadMovies without forceRefresh appends to existing data
